permissions: User must be authenticated and must be the creator of the post to update it.
side_effects: Updates the post. May enqueue background work to generate short_text_content, generate embeddings, create user_post_feed_posts, and create a post router when relevant fields change.
validation_notes: post-type, creator, and subject-post cannot be changed after creation. At least one updatable flag must be provided; otherwise the CLI returns an error. status must be one of: draft, published. published-at must be ISO 8601 datetime. Server requires at least one content field (text, image, video, audio, or action_content) and enforces text_content length max of 4000 characters by default (can vary by post type) and short_text_content length max of 280 characters by default (can vary by post type). If status is set to published and published-at is blank, the server sets published_at to the current time. For action post_type, action_content must be non-empty and match a valid action schema.
